menu.name: The Cheeseburger
menu.description: This burger is our signature burger. The Cheeseburger is a single-patty cheesed up bun-drop favourite!

menu.name: Black Bun Burger
menu.description: This black bun burger is an exotic piece of bun-drop heaven! You won't be able to stop talking about it!

menu.name: The double Cheeseburger
menu.description: This double-patty Cheeseburger is our signature burgers big brother. He's twice the size, naturally, more meat more treat!

menu.name: The Double Smashburger
menu.description: This burger is all about smashing through to your flavour palette, signed Bun-Drop!

menu.name: Fat Cheesy Burger
menu.description: The cousin of the single patty and double Cheeseburger. The cousin who likes to have all of it! A.K.A Fat Cheesy Burger

menu.name: Noble Cheeseburger
menu.description: You get to taste this burger and feel yourself become a bit more gentle, nicer and humbler. The Noble Burger.

menu.name: Big onion Cheeseburger
menu.description: Onions are great. They're even greater when you take the signature burger and put them together. The Big Onion Burger.

menu.name: Big BBQ Cheeseburger
menu.description: All time favourite of those summer days by the BBQ. We at Bun-drop give you the Big BBQ Cheeseburger!

menu.name: Quadrouple Cheese with Burger
menu.description: Well there's not much else to say other than that this Cheeseburger went four times around the world to become... The Quadrouple Cheese with Burger!

menu.name: Nice Fries
menu.description: Fries. Imagination ended right here. But do we need to imagine anything? Fries are Fries, which is nice. Nice Fries.

menu.name: Sweet Onion Fries
menu.description: Sweet onion fries. The fancier fries. The sweeter ones. Or are they?

menu.name: Oreo Chocolate Milkshake
menu.description: About 3000 reasons to have one of these. One of them is that its approximately 3000 calories in it. Oreo Chocolate Milkshake innit.

menu.name: Early Bird IPA
menu.description: Early bird gets the worm they say, well, here at Bun-Drop we say cheers.

menu.name: Fizzy lemon water
menu.description: Never gonna make you cry, Never gonna say goodbye, never gonna tell a lie and hurt you. Alright its Lemon Water but its fizzy.

menu.name: Coconut Water
menu.description: Water straight from the coconuts in Hawaii... well maybe not Hawaii but definetily from a coconut. Coconut Water. Yes.
